scripts.deploy: npm run setup-common && npm run setup-server && npm run setup-client && npm run setup-common-link-normal && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.setup-common-link-shared: cd ../client && npm link common && cd ../server && npm link common && cd ../tests && npm link common
scripts.setup-common-link-elevated: cd ../common && sudo npm link && cd ../server && npm run setup-common-link-shared
scripts.setup-common-link-normal: cd ../common && npm link && cd ../server && npm run setup-common-link-shared
scripts.setup-common: echo ------- Setting up common ------- && cd ../common && npm install && npx tsc
scripts.setup-client: echo ------- Setting up client ------- && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup-server: echo ------- Setting up server ------- && npm install && npx tsc
scripts.setup-tests: echo ------- Setting up tests -------  && cd ../tests && npm install
scripts.setup-shared: npm run setup-common && npm run setup-client && npm run setup-server && npm run setup-tests
scripts.setup-linux: npm run setup-shared && npm run setup-common-link-elevated
scripts.setup-win: npm run setup-shared && npm run setup-common-link-normal
